node.title: Midsummer Drought Test
node.excerpt: Over time and increasingly, I’m finding myself wanting a completely xeric front yard.  It probably started with seeing posts by Danger Garden and Flutter & Hum about Greg Shepherd’s garden, but there have been a million research projects, tests, conversations, garden visits, and boring hours watering plants by hand that have led me to commit […]

node.title: April sprouts, blooms, buds, and a couple new plants
node.excerpt: This is a post I started at the beginning of April and forgot to post.  Mostly recordkeeping…   That’s it for this very belated April update.  Funny, everything’s different now, especially now that we’re having some actual HOT weather (80F right now at 2pm April 25).  Excellent excuse for a new post!
